aboutFounder.title: About the Founder - Zaza Teach
aboutFounder.description: Meet Dr. Greg Blackburn, founder of Zaza Technologies. PhD in Professional Education, former CLO, and published researcher building AI tools that help teachers thrive.

hero.title: About the Founder
hero.subtitle: Dr. Greg Blackburn - Founder & CEO, Zaza Technologies
hero.altText: Photo of Dr. Greg Blackburn, Founder of Zaza Technologies

intro.paragraph1: I came to education the long way around - starting my career in operations and strategy before dedicating the last two decades to professional learning and EdTech.
intro.paragraph2: I hold a PhD in Professional Education from City, University of London. My work focuses on critical thinking, problem-solving, and making digital learning feel human.
intro.quote1: Helping teachers thrive by giving them back their time.
intro.paragraph3: I built Zaza Teach to give teachers back time, reduce Sunday stress, and bring the joy back to planning. The goal is simple - let teachers just teach.
intro.quote2: Blending pedagogy, business, and AI into tools that actually work.

credentials.title: Credentials
items: PhD in Professional Education - City, University of London
MBA - University of Queensland
First-Class Honours - Information Systems
Former Chief Learning Officer - Communardo (EU)
Corporate experience - 6 years at Telstra
Published researcher - eLearning and digital pedagogy

q1.question: Were you a teacher
q1.answer: No - my background is professional learning and EdTech. I work closely with teachers and school leaders to make AI useful, safe, and time-saving.

q2.question: What guides product decisions
q2.answer: Learning science, classroom reality, and measurable time savings for teachers.

steps.title: Operations and strategy beginnings
steps.body: Early career in corporate operations and strategy, including six years at Telstra.

steps.title: Academic research
steps.body: PhD in Professional Education. Focus on critical thinking and digital learning.

steps.title: Zaza founder
steps.body: Created Zaza to give teachers back time and build AI tools that feel human.

items.title: Featured expertise
items.text: Published internationally on critical thinking and digital learning.

items.title: Leadership
items.text: Former CLO leading large-scale learning programs in Europe.

items.title: Impact
items.text: Building AI tools that reduce workload and increase teacher confidence.

cta.title: Ready to reclaim your time?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Zaza Teach
privacy.description: How Zaza Teach collects, uses, and protects personal data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect your personal information and ensure better data security in compliance with global privacy regulations.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.content: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, school/organization name, and role to provide you access to our educational tools and services.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.content: We collect information about how you use our service, including features used, time spent, and usage patterns to improve our product and user experience.

studentData.title: Student Data Protected
studentData.content: We take extreme care with any student information that may be uploaded. No student personal information is shared, sold, or used for any purpose other than the educational services you've consented to.

communication.title: Communication
communication.content: We use your contact information to send product updates, support responses, and service-related communications. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
items: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information
Access to your data is strictly limited to authorized personnel
Regular security audits and monitoring ensure ongoing protection

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication, session management, and site functionality. Optional analytics cookies help us understand usage patterns to improve our service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdParty.content: When you connect third-party services (like Google Classroom), we only access data necessary for the integration to function. We do not store unnecessary data from these services.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
items: Account data: Retained while your account is active
Usage analytics: Aggregated data retained for product improvement
Support communications: Retained for customer service purposes
Deleted accounts: Data removed within 30 days of account deletion

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR and other privacy regulations, you have the following rights:
items: Right to Access: Receive a copy of your personal data
Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate personal data
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
Right to Portability: Export your data in machine-readable format
Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal data
Right to Restrict: Request restriction of processing

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be processed outside the EU/UK if necessary for service delivery. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are designed for use by educators. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without appropriate consent and safeguards.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our practices, technology, or legal requirements. We will notify users of significant changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service | Zaza Teach
terms.description: The terms that govern your use of Zaza Teach.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of Zaza Teach services. By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms and our Privacy Policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Zaza Teach, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy | Zaza Teach
cookies.description: How Zaza Teach uses cookies and similar technologies.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, ensure security, and provide our educational services effectively.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that websites place on your device. They help websites remember your preferences and settings to enhance your experience.

mission.title: Our Mission | Zaza Teach - Empowering Educators
mission.description: Learn about Zaza Teach's mission to transform education through AI-powered tools that help teachers reclaim their time and passion for teaching.

hero.title: Teaching is inspiring - but the workload is overwhelming
hero.subtitle: Too many teachers spend nights and weekends buried in lesson prep. Zaza Teach helps you take that time back so you can focus on what really matters - your students.

empathy.paragraph1: We've all seen it: teachers marking at midnight, planning on Sundays, and juggling endless admin instead of inspiring students. That's not sustainable.
empathy.paragraph2: Zaza Teach was built to change this. We give teachers back their evenings, their weekends, and their joy - because when educators thrive, students thrive too.

quote.text: For the first time in years, I had a Sunday dinner with my family instead of lesson planning.
quote.author: Year 6 Teacher

teacherCentered.title: Teacher-Centered Design
teacherCentered.description: Every feature is designed to cut hours off your prep time. Real classroom needs guide our design so you spend less time planning and more time teaching.

qualityEducation.title: Quality Education
qualityEducation.description: AI-assisted, not AI-replaced. Your expertise leads, technology supports. We enhance human creativity and pedagogy, never replace them.

privacySecurity.title: Privacy & Security
privacySecurity.description: Your lesson plans and student data are yours. Always private, always secure.

accessibilityForAll.title: Accessibility for All
accessibilityForAll.description: Great tools shouldn't depend on budget or technical know-how. Zaza Teach is simple, affordable, and made for every educator.

vision.title: Our Vision for the Future
vision.paragraph1: We imagine a world where teachers walk out at 4pm guilt-free, spend Sundays with family, and return on Monday refreshed.
vision.paragraph2: When teachers thrive, students thrive. That's the future we're building with Zaza Teach.

cta.title: Take back your time
cta.subtitle: Try Zaza Teach free today and see how it feels to plan lessons in minutes instead of hours.

about.title: About Zaza Teach | Zaza Teach - Made by Teachers, for Teachers
about.description: Learn about Zaza Teach - made by teachers, for teachers. Reclaiming time, energy, and passion for what matters most: your students.

hero.title: About Zaza Teach
hero.subtitle: Made by teachers, for teachers. Reclaiming time, energy, and passion for what matters most.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Every Sunday night, teachers across the world sit at their kitchen tables, laptops open, coffee growing cold, trying to turn curriculum standards into engaging lessons. It's 2 AM, and they're still crafting differentiated activities, searching for just the right resources, wondering if there's enough time to do it all justice.
mission.paragraph2: We know this story because we've lived it. Zaza Teach exists to change it.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.content: We believe teaching is a creative, deeply human profession that deserves better tools. Our AI-powered lesson planning gives you back your evenings, your weekends, and your energy for what truly matters: inspiring students.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Zaza Teach was born from a simple observation: the best teachers spend too much time on logistics and not enough time on what makes them exceptional. After countless conversations with educators burned out by administrative overhead, we realized technology could amplify teacher brilliance instead of replacing it.

quote.text: I used to spend 4-5 hours every Sunday planning my week. Now I spend 30 minutes reviewing and personalizing AI-generated lessons. I finally have time to think about my students as individuals again.
quote.author: Year 4 teacher, Birmingham

story.paragraph2: By combining deep pedagogical understanding with cutting-edge AI, we've created tools that understand what teachers actually need: curriculum-aligned content that's easily customizable, time-saving without sacrificing quality, and designed to enhance rather than diminish the human connection at the heart of great teaching.

teacherCentered.title: Teacher-Centered Design
teacherCentered.description: Every feature is designed with real classroom needs in mind. We don't just ask teachers what they want - we observe how they work and build tools that fit naturally into their workflow.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your lesson plans, student data, and teaching insights remain private and secure. We believe teacher intellectual property deserves the highest protection.

aiAssisted.title: AI-Assisted, Not AI-Replaced
aiAssisted.description: Technology should amplify human expertise, not replace it. Our AI handles the heavy lifting so teachers can focus on the irreplaceable human elements of education.

accessibleExcellence.title: Accessible Excellence
accessibleExcellence.description: Powerful teaching tools shouldn't be luxury items. We're committed to making world-class lesson planning accessible to educators everywhere.

inPractice.title: In Practice
inPractice.content: This means no vendor lock-in, transparent pricing, and tools that work whether you're in a well-funded district or stretching every resource to serve your students.

founder.title: Meet Our Founder
founder.name: Dr. Greg Blackburn
founder.bio: Dr. Blackburn brings years of classroom experience and educational technology expertise to Zaza Teach. His vision is simple: create technology that amplifies teacher effectiveness while preserving the irreplaceable human connection that makes great education possible.

quote.text: The best teachers I know are creative problem-solvers who see potential in every student. Our job is to give them the time and tools to act on that vision.
quote.author: Dr. Greg Blackburn

cta.title: Ready to Reclaim Your Time?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of teachers who've discovered what it feels like to have their weekends back while delivering better lessons than ever before.
